crimson

Product Name*

crimson

Product Version*

1.1.3

Vendor or Owner Contact

OpenOffice.org Contact*

URL for Product Information*

 URL for License*

 http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-1.1

Purpose*

 Crimson is a Java XML parser which supports XML 1.0. When added along with xml-apis.jar and xalan.jar to JDK 1.3.x they provide the xml language features of JDK 1.4.x that are required to build and work with the Flat XML filter in the OpenOffice.org filter modules. These jars are needed for JDK 1.3.1 build and runtime capabilities for OpenOffice.org.

Type of Encryption*

none

Binary or Source Code?*

binary (100% java source code available on xml.apache.org)

Hosting agreement
